nombre: Teaching English as a Foreign Language
desc: Professional master's degree focused on acquiring up-to-date theoretical foundations in areas such as second language acquisition, lesson planning, assessment, classroom management, and pedagogical material development, as well as training in academic research.
Certification of English proficiency at C2 level, the highest in the Common European Framework of Reference (CEFR).
Certification of knowledge in English language teaching methodologies, covering areas such as language structure, current methodologies, and classroom management.

nombre: Bachelor of Education and English Teacher
entidad: Pontificia Universidad Católica de Valparaíso, Chile
desc: Nine-semester professional program, including training in English language proficiency, linguistics, literature, and methodology in areas such as assessment and lesson planning.
